definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: love (NH Pi. id.; Ar. h.ab=a be loved; Eth. tah.ababa: amore alicujus incendi Di; Aram. h.ab kindle, be set on fire, h.abeb, [[חַבֵּב]] love, embrace, [[חוּבָּא]] bosom)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. [[אַף]] [[חׂבֵב עַמִּים]] De 33:3 (Di rds. [[עַמּוֹ]], cf. LXX).
